name: #9 Riswynn Thundermaster
description:
Riswynn Thundermaster

Race: Dwarf

Subraces and Variants:
Subrace: Duergar
Dragonmark Variant: Mark of Warding

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 142 years
Height: 4'0"
Weight: 138 lbs.
Eyes: Hazel
Skin: Light Brown

Gender: Male
Class: Paladin
Sacred Oath: Oath of Glory
Background: Azorius Functionary
Occupation: Aristocrat

Trait: I never change my mind once it's made up.
Ideal: Order. The law is meant to ensure that the gears of society turn smoothly and quietly. (Lawful)
Bond: I've modeled my career after a highly respected law-mage or arrester, but I fear that my role model might be involved in something illegal.
Flaw: I'm incapable of deception.

Description:
Appearance: Pronounced scar
High Ability: Charisma-persuasive, forceful, born leader
Low Ability: Dexterity-clumsy, fumbling
Talent: Great at impersonations
Mannerism: Frequently uses the wrong word
Interaction Trait: Curious
Values: Creativity (Chaotic), Out for revenge
Flaw or Secret: Enjoys decadent pleasures
